taxa.name: Burkholderia mallei
taxa.notes: formerly Pseudomonas mallei; Classified under SAPO

taxa.name: Escherichia coli
taxa.notes: hazard group 3* for verocytotoxigenic strains (eg O157:H7 or O103)

taxa.name: Francisella tularensis
taxa.notes: Type A; Type B hazard group 2

taxa.name: Neorickettsia sennetsu
taxa.notes: HSE listed name: Ehrlichia sennetsu & Rickettsia sennetsu

taxa.name: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi A
Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi B
Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi C
Salmonella spp
taxa.notes: Serovars other than arizonae, enterica serovar enteritidis, enterica serovar typhimurium 2, paratyphi A, B, C, typhi

taxa.name: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi
Trueperella pyogenes
taxa.notes: HSE listed name: Arcanobacterium pyogenes & Arcanobacterium pyogenes

taxa.name: Vibrio cholerae
taxa.notes: including El Tor; Toxigenic; Vaccine available

taxa.name: Cryptococcus neoformans var. neoformans
taxa.notes: alt name: Filobasidiella neoformans var neoformans; Allergen

taxa.name: Talaromyces marneffei
taxa.notes: HSE listed name: Penicillium marneffei; Allergen
